Document-level corpus

corpus_docs.Rd

A tidy dataset built from assignment PDFs. Each row is one document.

Usage

corpus_docs

Format

A tibble/data frame with the following columns:

source

Character. Heuristic document label (e.g., "A1", "A2", "A3") combined with a human-readable name derived from the filename.

n_paragraphs

Integer. Paragraph count produced by your data pipeline.

n_words

Integer. Rough word count based on whitespace tokenization.

n_chars

Integer. Approximate character count (coarse text size).

Source

Student-authored assignment PDFs.

Details

The dataset is created in data-raw/ from PDFs stored in inst/extdata/. It is designed to be consumed directly by the Shiny app without reading external files.
